title: Did the Trump Department set up a task force to "unnaturalize" immigrants?
subtitle: In June 2018, the United States Citizenship and Immigration Services announced that they were employing a new office targeting naturalized citizens who had betrayed their applications.
author: David Emery
vclaim: New United States The Task Force on Citizenship and Immigration Services is mandated to identify naturalized citizens who have betrayed their applications and to seek the revocation of their nationality, a process known as "naturalisation."
